message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,000 is simply too low.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go below $9,500.  This still leaves a fair amount of room for you to get a great value.  Let me know if you're interested in this offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $9,000. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $9,000?
